## IYAxisConfig interface

Configures a Y axis of the chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IYAxisConfig extends IAxisConfig 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [IAxisConfig](./plot.iaxisconfig.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [max?](./plot.iyaxisconfig.max.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the maximum value to render on the axis. |
|  [min?](./plot.iyaxisconfig.min.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the minimum value to render on the axis. |
